casebody.data:
No. 09-8645. Bernard Johnson, Petitioner v. Joseph T. Smith, Superintendent, Shawangunk Correctional Facility. 559 U.S. 983, 130 S. Ct. 1715,

176 L. Ed. 2d 199,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 1974. March 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Same case below, 354 Fed. Appx. 516.
